title: Lagging for no reason
body: 101 fps 34 ms and my game keeps spiking really hard it's only my League that is doing this i have less lag playing WoW and Destiny 2 on max settings than my League with lowest settings possible. How do i fix this?

replies.body: Nice, what do you play in WoW?  It sounds like you might be experiencing packet loss.  Are you on wifi?  it could be the cause of the instability.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted game, and let me know what you find.  Though your other games might be running okay, you can still run into issues with specific services.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=adcfOdIV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-28T21:07:42.840+0000)
>
> Nice, what do you play in WoW?  It sounds like you might be experiencing packet loss.  Are you on wifi?  it could be the cause of the instability.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted game, and let me know what you find.  Though your other games might be running okay, you can still run into issues with specific services.

I play rogue and DK, you? I got a 91/100 on my connection score;Avg Latency 38.90 ms; Avg Packet Loss 0.24%; Avg Jitter 1.88 ms

Ohh, topping those dps charts?  This poro is Ret for life.  :)  91 is okay but it's not super great.  See if a [power cycle](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic) might help you out here, I didn't catch if you were on wifi but that would help a lot either way.  I also recommend [configuring your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in case your routing is having issues specifically getting to the game server.

Hope that helps!  Oh, and for the Alliance! :)

I also recommend [configuring your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in case your routing is having issues specifically getting to the game server.
> 
> Hope that helps!  Oh, and for the Alliance! :)

I hate playing ret it's so boring this expac especially lol. 92 is the highest my internet provided by my internet provider and i am plugged into Ethernet also i am lagging slightly less now after doing the power cycle but there is still lag none the less.
And for the Alliance my man! Gnomes are master race :P.

Ah yeah, certainly masterful engineers.   My Gnomish Army Knife never leaves my side.  :)  Though I wonder if their technological feats could beat that of Hextech?  Hmm.  I'm glad running a wired connection helped, that's progress!  Let me know if configuring your DNS helps, your ISP's routing to the game server could be having issues.  You can also run a traceroute to know for sure:

Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes, replace the IP address with dashes on the first two rows only, and let me know what you find.

 is this what you wanted? and configuring  my dns didnt help at all :/

Thanks, this is perfect!  I had our tech team take a look at this but we need some more info and to run it a bit longer too.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll dig into this with you individually and find some more options through there.
